mapper.select: SELECT * from USER WHERE user_email = #{userEmail} and user_password = #{userPassword}
mapper.insert: INSERT USER(user_email, user_password, user_name, user_phone) VALUES (#{userId}, #{userPassword}, #{userName}, #{userPhone})
mapper.update: UPDATE USER SET user_password = #{userPassword}, user_name = #{userName}, user_phone = #{user_phone} WHERE user_email = #{userEmail}
